name: Depths of Dagon
description:
Depths of Dagon

Dear Alex,

I write this to let you know I am fine. These rumors about me joining a cult are just that, rumors.  We, in the community, abhor the vanity of the cities and must breathe the fresh countryside air here in Duxbury. We converted an abandoned church into a haven for lost souls, and together we strive to make a real difference in the world. The priest, our great leader, told us that the time for the Change is nigh and that infidels like you won't understand.  He will come. He will remake the world. You will see. Everyone will see!

Leslie

Keyboard Shortcuts
  • Almost everything can be controlled by the mouse, but these may help
  • Use WASD / arrow keys for movement
  • Use F to interact with objects (open doors, chests, etc) - No Mouse Equivalent
  • Use underlined letters for combat (S to skill attack, E to Equip, U to use health pendant)
Tips
  • You can use health pendants and equip weapons/items outside of combat, make sure you are prepared!
  • Some weapons hit all enemies.
  • Don't forget to invest your skill points, clicking a skill icon will tell you what it does.
